animeTitle: Girls & Panzer: Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza - Extra
animeDescription: In honor of Girls & Panzer TV & OVA receiving a 5.1ch Blu-ray Disc BOX set, a new Akiyama Yukari's Tank Course "Extra" was made with nearly a half hour worth of content.   A short ~7 minute watermarked 'preview' version was available on Bandai Namco's official YouTube Channel on September 29, 2018.
animeRelated: ['Girls & Panzer', 'Girls & Panzer: Kore ga Hontou no Anzio-sen Desu!']
